Pre-Game Insights: Australia has struggled in all facets in the World Cup so far
Sri Lanka has leaked runs at an alarming rate and lost captain Dasun Shanaka to injury
Australia made two changes after just one match, with the omission of Alex Carey being a major talking point
Others: The match is almost a must-win for both teams to retain realistic semi-final hopes
Kusal Mendis will now take on the captaincy for Sri Lanka
Adam Zampa has struggled in the tournament so far
There is pressure on the big three quicks to lift their game and make early inroads for Australia
Sri Lanka may be without slingy fast bowler Matheesha Pathirana due to a right shoulder problem
